CustomField.description: The default search logic that is selected when searching for resources using the Additional Filter section of the Search Resources page. You can enter a value of OR or AND. The default value is AND.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default search logic that is selected when searching for resources using the Additional Filter section of the Search Resources page. You can enter a value of OR or AND. The default value is AND.
CustomField.label: Default Search Logic Additional Fields
